item.title: .:whoami:. | PGiatasti
item.description: About Us PGiatasti team was born during CyberChallenge.IT 2019 from the passion of some guys for the endless field of InfoSec. The philosophy of the team is based on knowledge sharing and continuous acquisition of new skills. We love to play CTF and become more and more skilled after every competition.
